text: Be not proud of your body, youth, wealth or dominions; all are as a mirage in the desert.
O man, grasp this Truth firmly in your soul. The whole world is just like a dream; it will pass away in an instant.
If you desire to play this game of love with Me, then step onto My Path with your head in hand.
Forgiveness is the ornament of the brave.
source: Sikh Proverb from Guru Granth Sahib
